text: Kun manu etu sob dukh pora nomori kene bachi jaise, taikhan pora ki paap kaam korise, etu pora mon ghura nai aru suna, chandi, pitol, pathor aru khuri pora bona murti ke puja nakoribole rukhanai- eitu khan pora eku dikhi bole napare, aru huni bole bhi napare, aru taikhan bera bole napare9.20 1 Chr. 34:25..
